					[815] cell 'Magento Open Source June release brings important accessibility and security updates We are excited to announce great new accessibility updates in PWA Studio, along with multiple security updates in our June release. PWA Studio can now address the needs of people with all types, degrees, and combinations of disability. These guidelines make Web content more usable for individuals with changing abilities due to aging and often improve usability for users in general. step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see that I am already on the notifications page. The page URL is 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/admin/notification/index/' and the heading of the page is 'Notifications'. The page displays a table with system notifications including their severity, date added, message content, and available actions. There are 5 notifications listed with various severity levels (MAJOR, CRITICAL, NOTICE). The goal was to navigate to the notifications page to view system notifications and alerts, which has been accomplished. I should inform the user that we have successfully reached the notifications page and what they can see here.
step_data.action: stop('You are now on the Notifications page. The page displays 5 system notifications with different severity levels (MAJOR, CRITICAL, NOTICE). Each notification shows its severity, date added, message content, and available actions like "Mark as Read" or "Remove". You can manage these notifications from this page.')
